mapper.sql: COMPANY_ID, COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_TYPE, COMPANY_STATUS, COMPANY_ADDR_PROVINCE, COMPANY_ADDR_CITY, COMPANY_ADDR_DISTRICT, COMPANY_ADDR, COMPANY_USCC, COMPANY_FULL_NAME, CORPORATE_NAME, CORPORATE_ID_CODE, CORPORATE_PHONE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATETIME
mapper.select:
select
from company_baseinfo where 1=1
and m.company_id in
#{item}
AND (COMPANY_ID like CONCAT('%',#{searchObject},'%') or COMPANY_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{searchObject},'%'))
AND COMPANY_TYPE=#{COMPANY_TYPE}
ORDER BY COMPANY_ID DESC
mapper.insert: insert into company_baseinfo (COMPANY_ID, COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_TYPE, COMPANY_STATUS, COMPANY_ADDR_PROVINCE, COMPANY_ADDR_CITY, COMPANY_ADDR_DISTRICT, COMPANY_ADDR, COMPANY_USCC, COMPANY_FULL_NAME, CORPORATE_NAME, CORPORATE_ID_CODE, CORPORATE_PHONE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATETIME ) values (#{companyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{companyStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{companyAddrProvince,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyAddrCity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyAddrDistrict,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyUscc,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{companyFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corporateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corporateIdCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corporatePhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
